text: Brickellia huahuapana is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to the state of Oaxaca in southern Mexico.Turner, Billie Lee 2010. Phytologia 92(1): 16-17; figures 1, 3). ==References== huahuapana Category:Flora of Oaxaca Category:Plants described in 2010
title: Brickellia huahuapana
